Hi, I am Venkateswar B

front-end dev

What I do

RestCountriesAPI

This project was developed using React Redux and Saga as middleware. The user can search for a particular country, or see all the countries in a particular continent. Dynamic routing was implemented to navigate to the respective country details. The data is fetched using async-await features from an external API.

Live Link

Code

Static Job Landing page

Live Link

Code

The data has nesting upto 4 levels and it was a challenge to filter data based on user input selection based on intermediate levels of data nesting. I have used arrays as data type for state management and ensured the manipulation of data is pure without side effects by using spread operator. I have also used callback functions for lifting the state up to the parent component while removing of buttons inside the search-bar.

URL Shortening API

Integrates with the rel.ink URL shortening API and lets you play with browser storage in this landing page project. This project was implemented in React using React hooks like useState, useEffect. Local Storage functionality was used to make the browser retain state even after refresh.
